title.rendered: Smile kids goes on a picnic cum educational trip

content.rendered:
150 children from Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centres at Nepali Basti and Damdamia in Agartala, Tripura, went out for a picnic cum educational trip to an Organic Agro Farm. The main purpose of the trip was to impart knowledge to the children about various types of agricultural plantations, crops, fruits, vegetables and the process of organic farming.

The children, led by their teachers, also indulged in interactive games, fun activities and some dancing.
